page.title: 06CHALFONT AREA HOTELS
page.content: The Bell House{Hotel} The Bell House Hotel is quite large. It has 120 rooms and 160 staff. The standard of the rooms is good. Some bedrooms have a colour T.V., radio, telephone, bath, basin, toilet and two beds. The standard menu includes steak, soup, melon and fish. The children's menu includes fish and chips and beefburger with chips. Some people stay at the Hotel because it is easier for them to get to work. The Hotel accommodates about 900 a week. A room for a night costs around 50 pounds. There are some flags outside the Hotel indicating that people may visit from all over the world.Not many people use the Hotel for recreational purposes, but mainly for business reasons.
